tier.item: a. óZáki a-wo-oki kííbo óPoso a-éza-aki bá-bana mw-énzi.
`Jack said that Poso gave the children a message.'

the-CM-duck CM-peck-PAST the-rice REL-CM-buy-PAST the-child today
`The duck pecked on the rice which the child bought today.

The letter was sent by Poso.
`The tree was chopped down by the woman here.'
